titles.title: Tesagure! Bukatsumono Encore
Поиск! Клубная деятельность: На бис
てさぐれ! 部活もの あんこーる
Tesagure! 2
摸索吧！部活剧 再来一个

relatedanime.anime: Tesagure! Bukatsumono Spin-off Purupurun Sharumu to Asobou

anime.description: Koharu is recruited into an unusual "groping" club only for the reason that she doesn`t overlap with the other members` characters. Groping club is in fact an unofficial club with no real activity or purpose, prompting the girls to work on finding one. Strange daily life ensues, where club activities consist of first coming up with club stereotypes, then figuring out a new way to operate such a club. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: 決して離れない
No Getting Away from It
Kesshite Hanarenai
episode.summary: April. Exactly one year ago, Suzuki Yua (Yua-senpai), Sato Hina (Hiina), and Takahashi Aoi invited Tanaka Koharu (Koharun) to join their "Tesaguri Club". Now, Koharun looks back on the year that was. Over the last 12 months, the four of them thought about many different clubs and postulated an abundance of new wrinkles. Koharun became a member because she wanted to have a high school life that was out of the ordinary and somewhere along the line, her wish came true. But then third-year students Yua and Hiina graduated. While Aoi and Koharun set up the same table in the same place as the previous year so they can invite new students to join, they reminisce about the last 12 months. What kind of new students will join the club this year? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あらゆる試練に耐えた誠実
Good Faith to Withstand Every Trial
Arayuru Shiren ni Taeta Seijitsu
episode.summary: After Koharun and Aoi choose the anime pattern in which time doesn`t actually pass, they`re rejoined by Yua and Hiina, and the Tesaguri Club is back in session. The members discuss whether they get to keep their memories from the first season. In the clubroom, they think of a new high school basketball team, but Yua announces that since this Encore season was suddenly decided on, the animators didn`t have enough time to work on these early episodes, so advises the rest of the members to be still as much as possible. That doesn`t stop Aoi from performing her trademark unconventional moves, though... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あなたは美しいが冷淡だ
You`re Beautiful, but Cold
Anata wa Utsukushii ga Reitan Da
episode.summary: Yua delivers the distressing news that the animation studio still hasn`t caught up, so they`ll either have to remain stock-still again or find a new way to get through the episode with limited animation. At the club, the topic is a judo club, followed by a judo-related activity in the gym that embarrasses Koharu to the max! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 完璧な魅力
Perfect Charm
Kanpeki na Miryoku
episode.summary: The school`s festival is coming soon, but the Tesagure Club has never officially participated. Koharu`s enthusiasm for somehow getting involved spurs a discussion and what to do is almost decided for them as the band club suddenly can`t participate, but one of their members asks Yua to represent them. And before they know it, the Tesagure Club is on stage, cracking jokes and performing a song that encapsulates their club. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美的調和
Beautiful Harmony
Biteki Chouwa
episode.summary: Koharu finds out that the surveillance cameras throughout the school aren`t really cameras at all, but are still a form of "protection"! Later, the members take on the rugby club, with their usual blue humor and all! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悲しんでいる時のあなたが好き
I Like You When You`re Sad
Kana Shindeiru Toki no Anata ga Suki
episode.summary: The members ponder the question of why students always have access to the school roof in anime. And can they go up on their own school`s roof? Later at the club, they dissect high school broadcasting clubs and try thinking of new wrinkles to such a club. They also create a compelling potential manga/anime story centering around a broadcasting club. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 私はあなただけを見つめる
I`m Only Looking at You
Watashi wa Anata Dake o Mitsumeru
episode.summary: This time, the Tesaguri club members pick on school volleyball teams, with Aoi`s prejudiced preconceptions again leading to a warped image of that club. Later in the gym, the members actually play volleyball, but can they do it while defending a town made out of blocks as well? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あなたは偽れない
You Can`t Pretend
Anata wa Itsuwarenai
episode.summary: When the members tackle an "art club", Aoi`s biases come to the fore, but Koharu is delighted when the others create a richly detailed manga outline. Later in the gym, their artistic sense is given full rein! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 優美な女性
Elegant Woman
Yuubi na Josei
episode.summary: The final episode of Encore flashes back to when Mio first recruited a then-anti-social Aoi and skips around through her first year with the club. In the end, though, it`s the start of another new school year with Aoi and Koharu. What "pattern" will they choose the next time around? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 秘めた愛
Secret Love
Himeta Ai
episode.summary: The club members quiz a youngish teacher about whether she fits the anime stereotype of a youngish female teacher. Later, when Mobuko and her many sisters sit in on the Tesagure meeting, they tackle two traditional Japanese clubs, kendo and rakugo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うぬぼれ
Conceited
Unubore
episode.summary: Yua riddles her fellow Tesaguri Club members, which leads into a conversation about the Sphinx`s famous riddle. Later, they brainstorm a "new athletic festival", and finally attempt to combine riddles and an athletic festival. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 猜疑心
Suspicion
Saigishin
episode.summary: Koharu learns that the best friend of the "main character" knows everything about the girls in school, including an embarrassing fact about her. Later on, the Tesaguri club members take on the "quiz bowl", but when they think of a "new quiz bowl", the meeting becomes a contest of wills between Yua and Hiina! Source: crunchyroll
